excerpt.rendered:
A triple whammy of exfoliating goodness. Awaken to the wonders of this aromatic blend of sandalwood powder, desiccated coconut meat and milled coconut shell, perked up with an indulgent dose of cacao seed extract, coffee and vanilla beans, and sweetened with intoxicating ylang ylang blossom oil. A comforting anti-oxidant combination that’s utterly addictive.

You can buy this product here: Shopalila
